title: Bug 116609 [Regression] Color orange doesn't work.
description: When attempting to set the color to orange in a report item, the color does not appear as expected. The background color also does not work. This is a recent regression.
OB: When setting the color or background color to orange in a report item, the color does not appear as expected.
EB: I would expect that when setting the color or background color to orange in a report item, the color actually appears as orange.
SR: To reproduce this issue, follow these steps: 1. Insert a report item. 2. Set the color or background color to orange. 3. Verify that the color does not appear as orange.
